body.name: Garmin Approach S42 (Rose Gold/Light Sand) Womens Golf GPS Watch | Golfer's Bundle with Portable Charger & HD Tempered Glass Screen Protectors | 42,000+ Courses, Green View True Shape & F/M/B Yardage
features: [GARMIN APPROACH S42 GOLF WATCH] - Play with confidence with Approach S42, a GPS golf smart watch and golf score tracker that’s designed for lowering your score on the course and upping your style off the course.

[STYLISH ENOUGH TO WEAR ALL DAY] - This sleek Garmin golf watch rangefinder features a sunlight-readable and touchscreen color display. The Approach S42 ladies golf watches also serve as an activity tracker of your calories, steps, and sleep.

[LOWER YOUR SCORE ON THE COURSE] - This Garmin golf GPS watch is preloaded with 42,000+ worldwide courses, provides each green's true shape, and delivers quick distances to the front, middle, back of green as well as layups and hazards to help lower your score.

[BE UPDATED WITH IMPORTANT ALERTS] - Receive smart notifications directly to your wrist and have access to built-in sports so you can stay fit! For automatic game tracking, pair this Garmin GPS golf watch for women with the compatible CT10 sensors.
[GARMIN APPROACH S42 POWER BUNDLE] - Garmin Approach S42 Wrist Golf GPS Watch, PlayBetter 5000mAh Portable Charger, HD Tempered Glass Screen Protectors (x2) & USB Charging/Data Cable
body.description: About the Garmin Approach S42 Stylish and functional, this Garmin golf watch is not just meant on the golf course - but also the perfect smartwatch for everyday wear. The Approach S42 features a lightweight built with an easy-to-read,1.2-inch color touchscreen display, plus quick-release bands that sit comfortably on any wrist - making it the ultimate golf watch for men and women golfers. Play straight hours of golf with its 15-hour battery life in GPS mode and up to 10 days in smartwatch mode. Top Highlights of the Approach S42 Make the perfect shot with its accurate and reliable GPS-based yardages to the front, middle, and back of the green. The AutoShot Detection measures and auto-records detected shot distances, while Green View allows manual pin positioning to give each green’s true shape from anywhere on the course. This golf watch also shows layup distances on the fairways, and distances to clear hazards. Preloaded with more than 42,000 courses worldwide and always refreshed with Auto CourseView updates, the Approach S42 is a must-have to help lower scores and elevate your golf game. Pair with optional Approach CT10 club tracking sensors (sold separately) for more tracking capabilities, and don't forget to download the Garmin Golf app to access game history, leaderboards, and score cards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Garmin Approach S42 GPS Golf Smartwatch Experience accuracy, style, and functionality with the Garmin Approach S42 GPS golf watch. Designed to lower scores and work as an all-around golf wearable, this Garmin golf smartwatch is loaded with essential golfing features such as Green View, AutoShot, and more than 42,000 CourseView maps worldwide. Enjoy its long-battery life, touchscreen interface, and comfortable fit - a golf watch you sure won't have to take off when out of the course.

About the Garmin Approach S42 Stylish and functional, this Garmin golf watch is not just meant on the golf course - but also the perfect smartwatch for everyday wear. The Approach S42 features a lightweight built with an easy-to-read,1.2-inch color touchscreen display, plus quick-release bands that sit comfortably on any wrist - making it the ultimate golf watch for men and women golfers. Play straight hours of golf with its 15-hour battery life in GPS mode and up to 10 days in smartwatch mode. Top Highlights of the Approach S42 Make the perfect shot with its accurate and reliable GPS-based yardages to the front, middle, and back of the green. The AutoShot Detection measures and auto-records detected shot distances, while Green View allows manual pin positioning to give each green’s true shape from anywhere on the course. This golf watch also shows layup distances on the fairways, and distances to clear hazards. Preloaded with more than 42,000 courses worldwide and always refreshed with Auto CourseView updates, the Approach S42 is a must-have to help lower scores and elevate your golf game. Pair with optional Approach CT10 club tracking sensors (sold separately) for more tracking capabilities, and don't forget to download the Garmin Golf app to access game history, leaderboards, and score cards. Main Features An everyday wear golf watch with touchscreen display Preloaded with more than 42,000 CourseView maps Automatically records and measures detected shot distances Provides each green’s true shape anywhere on the course Yardage to F/M/B (distance to front, middle and back of green) Also tracks daily activities and offers access to sports apps

PlayBetter HD Tempered Glass Screen Protectors for Approach S42 (2-Pack) Keep your Garmin Approach S42 looking brand new with our pack of high-definition tempered glass screen protectors. Crystal clear and tough as a nail, they're a must-have accessory. PlayBetter Portable Charger Never run out of battery! With our PlayBetter Portable Charger, you can keep your golf watch and other gadgets charged at all times. HD Tempered Glass Portable Charger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than a range finder.
reviews.reviewText: Used mine once so far and love it. It tells the how far everything is from water crossing to how far and long the bunkers are to clear them. It's nice not having to reach for a rangefinder on everything hole/shot. Everything is at your fingertips. Super easy to use. Just make sure you put it on your lead hand (the one with the glove) otherwise it won't read when you hit your shot. If you want to take your golf game to the next level I'd recommend this watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Women’s White GPS Golf Watch
reviews.reviewText: Nice design and full of various apps for activities and GPS tracking for golf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great watch with a small band
reviews.reviewText: I have an 8” wrist. Unfortunately this watch, an S42 with the white band, doesn’t fit me. The Amazon website does not mention the fact this watch is for small to medium wrist size. I learned this from the Garmin site. If you have a wrist larger than 176mm order the black version S42. It fits wrist up to 202mm.Amazon needs to update their website’s product description to reflect this information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and comfortable. Easy to read. Uncomplicated to use. With back up battery ack no fear of not being able to play 2 rounds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Great looking watch ! Many options and accuracy . Understanding the instructions a little uphill. Used it twice and the battery life exceeded my expectations

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars words from tuff ol bird
reviews.reviewText: easy to read... nice size face. good distance of front, mid/back. can hit the down arrow to find bunkers... distance to water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Watch is great - don't waste $$$ on the bundle.
reviews.reviewText: I want to keep my review of the Garmin watch separate from the bundle that I purchased. I love the watch. I enjoy the interface and it does exactly what i need it to do when I'm connected to Garmin Golf and Garmin connect.My issue is with the portable charger that came with this bundle. It stopped functioning (won't charge) and apparently i can't return/replace/get any service on it since I received it on July 20 and it is now August 21 (past 30 days?). What a waste!!! I am very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars okayest golf watch
reviews.reviewText: This watch does a good job of giving distance reads oncourse. However the bluetooth has been very glitchy. I have had to uninstall and reinstall several times to get score and other stats to update to the app. Bluetooth is a pretty old and reliable tech. its disappointing this works so poorly. If you're not that interested in keeping your stats it's great. During the round it gives good info. If you want your stats on your phone for review or your handicap. It's a royal pain to get it to update to the app.
